name: Branded in Red
text: Target 1 "Despia" monster or 1 "Fallen of Albaz" in your GY; add it to your hand, then you can Fusion Summon 1 Level 8 or higher Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand or field, but it cannot attack directly this turn. You can only activate 1 "Branded in Red" per turn.
